text: Gloria Talbott (February 7, 1931 â€“ September 19, 2000) was an American actress who acted in movies and television. She acted in the 1959 TV series The Untouchables. She also played Kay Scott in All That Heaven Allows. Talbott was born in Glendale, California. She died there from kidney failure. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Glendale, California Category:1931 births Category:2000 deaths
